Fun game... for the most part. different types of killers which allows for a different experience every time. survivors are fun as well. Game is VERY grindy considering you have to get perks for certain killers and for the survivors as well. recommend playing it with friends to have a better time <3

Edit: almost 600 hours in the game, and i can honestly say its the worst game you can have in your library :). save yourself some cash and go order some nice food.

Edit 2: still the worst game you can have in your library :)

This game is one of the best ive played. I have 721 hrs. What i love about this game is that theres So many people to play as and so many different things, You can run a meta build, A meme build, and a noob build.

O jogo é bom a partir do momento que você aprende alguns conceitos. A comunidade é meio tóxica, mas não afeta na gameplay em si na maioria das vezes. Um ponto muito bom dele é que você pode montar sua própria build, com a mais variada quantidade de vantagens, itens, complementos. Os desenvolvedores lutam pra manter o jogo vivo, o que é muito bom. Às vezes você vai passar raiva (às vezes = a cada 2 partidas ou menos), mas no fundo, o jogo é muito bom. MUITO bom.

Токсичная помойка с 0 балансом. За сурва буквально нечего делать, чтобы за него научиться играть нужно 3 минуты после первого запуска. Заводка генов и усё. Маньяк же должен потеть и терпеть убер токсичное сообщество сурвомейнеров. Тем более, вообще не в кайф К А Ж Д Ы Й раунд за киллера получать пати игроков с 4к часами против моих 200.
Заколебало, никакие длс уже не спасут эту дичь от разрушения. Надеюсь, когда-то дбд станет крутой игрой. Но не у этих разрабов.

НЕ ПОКУПАЙТЕ, если хотите нормально провести вечер без уймы потраченных нервов.

I love the concept in general, the lore is awesome, the original killers and survivors are so creative and we also have licensed characters which makes this even cooler. I recommend it for any horror fan but don't take this game as a competitive one, it's not. It's based on RNG so just have fun & ignore the meanies! :D ♥☺
